subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1705 is on the way
description_text:
I cant see the shipment Its no shipping in last 3 monts Verstuurd vanaf mijn iPhone Op 18 jun 2025 om 14:50 heeft SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> het volgende geschreven: ﻿
 
 







 
 Your order is on the way 
 
 
 
 


 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 SIMSONN
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 Order #SSN1705
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Your order is on the way 
 Your order is on the way. Track your shipment to see the delivery status. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 View your order 
 
 
 
 
 
 or Visit our store
 
 
 


 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 SF Express tracking number: SF6045775298716
 
 



 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Items in this shipment 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback × 1 

 
 Plus X Pedal Control Box 
 

 
 
 


 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback × 1 

 
 VAM Pro Set (3 pac/includes power supply) 
 

 
 
 


 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com
